name: Change
storyline:
Have you ever had a period of time when you couldn't get your spirits up no matter what, always thinking that it would be better if you left here, but nothing changed when you changed the environment?
I feel that what I do is meaningless, I just want to do "what I want to do", but I don't even know what "what I want to do" is.
I am afraid that my life will end so plainly, but I have never found an opportunity to change...

The plot tells the story of a girl who can't get along in Shanghai and becomes an idol.
summary: Change is a word game about "growing up". The game adopts a dual-protagonist narrative method. It unfolds from the perspective of a girl Leyang who doesn't know where her future is going, and the idol producer of a startup company that is about to go bankrupt. The duration of the game is about 1-2 hours, and there is only one ending.
